column1: 1. Enter platform name above (Booking, Airbnb, Expedia, Google Hotels, TripAdvisor, etc.)
2. Mark YOUR hotel with brackets: [Your Hotel Name]
4. Fill at least ONE day of prices (same date for all hotels)
5. Include number of reviews for each hotel
6. Use same currency for all prices (EUR, USD, GBP, etc.)
- Leave days blank if no data available
- If analyzing only Single or Double rooms, you can leave the other section empty
- Ensure all prices are from the SAME date
- Higher review counts = more reliable data
